title: The Eye of the glasses
creator_credit: Geoffrey Clifton and Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School
brief_description: A mugger kills a passing stranger and inherits a pair of spectacles with magical properties. The glasses reveal the physical world to him as his subconscious perceives it.
creator_credit_for_label: Geoffrey Clifton and Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School
